scripts.build: shx rm -rf dist && shx mkdir dist && shx cp -r public/* dist && npx esbuild src/index.ts --bundle --outfile=dist/_worker.js --format=esm --platform=neutral --target=es2022 --loader:.html=text
scripts.dev: npm run gen && wrangler pages dev dist
scripts.deploy: npm run build && wrangler pages deploy dist
